hero.title: Revolutionize Your Website with Lama Bot
hero.subtitle: Seamless custom AI chatbot integration in minutes — no coding skills required

items.title: On-Point Responses
items.description: Lama Bot leverages your business domain and website's content to provide accurate and relevant answers.

items.title: Flexible Integration Options
items.description: Use our WordPress plugin or embed via a simple script — compatible with any website.

items.title: Real-Time Page Context
items.description: The assistant utilizes the content of the page your visitor is viewing to deliver precise assistance.

paragraphs.title: Introducing Lama Bot custom AI chatbot

items.title: Enhance User Experience
items.content: Provide instant support, answer queries, and engage your visitors like never before with our intelligent AI assistant.

items.title: Personalized Responses
items.content: The assistant utilizes the content of the page your visitor is viewing and combines it with its knowledge base to deliver precise assistance.

items.title: State-of-the-Art Technology
items.content: Using the lates AI technology and robust infrastructure to ensure speed and uptime, providing a seamless experience for your visitors.

cta.title: Ready to Elevate Your Website Experience?
cta.subtitle: Enter your email address and our support will contact you as soon as possible.

cookies.title: We Value Your Privacy
cookies.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience and analyze our website’s performance. Please choose whether to accept or reject non-essential cookies.
